translations: adj.可口的（等于 flavourful）；充满……味道的；有香味的

sentences.sentence: Fresh food is also more flavorful, so you will feel more satisfied.
sentences.translation: 生鲜食品也更加美味，会使你觉得更满意。

sentences.sentence: I have to say that I agree, this dough is flavorful and very easy to work with.
sentences.translation: 我同意这种说法，这次的面团味道很好而且容易处理。

sentences.sentence: Ales are a more flavorful beer and are made with a different type of yeast than lagers.
sentences.translation: 淡色啤酒(ale)是由不同类型的酵母发酵而成，比窖藏啤酒(lager)味道更好。
